word_mean: 新生层：骨的膜内骨化时，骨膜组织疏松的内细胞层
形成层：木本植物树皮下的一层细胞

sentence.Network_en: Acropetal differentiation of the cambium layer continues as the primary root elongates.
sentence.Network_cn: 形成层的向顶分化像初生根伸长一样在继续进行.

sentence.Network_en: The base of scoin is cut diagonally to expose a large oval of cambium.
sentence.Network_cn: 接穗的基部被切成斜形,暴露出椭圆形的大圈形成层.

sentence.Network_en: The callus originated from several parts , but mainly from cambium.
sentence.Network_cn: 愈伤组织是多起源的, 但主要源于形成层.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting one of the alimentary humours once supposed to nourish the body): from medieval Latin, change, exchange'

means.word_mean: 1. formative one-cell-thick layer of tissue between xylem and phloem in most vascular plants that is responsible for secondary growth
2. the inner layer of the periosteum

auth_sentence.content: If you kill the cambium, you can't grow the xylem there and so that year you end up with a scar, a fire scar.
auth_sentence.res_content: If you kill the cambium, you can't grow the xylem there and so that year you end up with a scar, a fire scar.
